ModMetaData.name: Komodon
ModMetaData.author: Exanth
ModMetaData.description:
Adds big strong turtles to the game! They're smart too, and can be trained to haul things. (Komodons are creatures from my dungeons and dragons game)
-V1.1- Reduced the komodon's pet value from 2000 to 500 Made their size and intelligence more apparent
